* how to convert "wk1" to 1 (not "1")


```{r}
df <- tribble(
  ~"Item No",  ~"Week",
  1, "Wk1",
  2, "Wk2",
  3, "Wk3",
  25, "Wk4"
)
df
df |>
  mutate(
    Week = parse_number(Week)
  )
```
* extracting `nth` element of each group


```{r}
flights |>
  group_by(year, month, day) |>
  summarize(
    first_dep = first(dep_time, na_rm = T),
    fifth_dep = nth(dep_time, 5, na_rm = T),
    last_dep = last(dep_time, na_rm = T)
  )

flights |>
  group_by(year, month, day) |>
  summarize(
    first_dep = dep_time[1],
    fifth_dep = dep_time[5],
    last_dep = dep_time[n() - 4],
    n = n()
  )
dep_time <- flights |>
  filter(year == 2013, month == 1, day == 1) |>
  select(dep_time)

nrow(dep_time)
tail(dep_time)
```
